realtime.name: RealTime Ltd.
realtime.content: Responsible for layout and JavaScript. I participated in two Next blockchain projects, a backstage management system by Vue.js and a real-time chat robot with a backstage page by React.js.<0></0><0></0>I usually play a leader in how to develop the project and discuss with developers to solve the problem. Also, I introduced Functional Programming, TypeScript, and Unit Test to improve development flow, reduce bugs and maintain costs.
